CmdLine: yum -y update;   curl -L https://omnitruck.chef.io/install.sh | bash;   yum install -y iproute sudo less vim tree;   GEM_HOME="/tmp/verifier/gems"   GEM_PATH="/tmp/verifier/gems"   GEM_CACHE="/tmp/verifier/gems/cache"   /opt/chef/embedded/bin/gem install busser --no-rdoc --no-ri     --no-format-executable -n /tmp/verifier/bin --no-user-install;   GEM_HOME="/tmp/verifier/gems"   GEM_PATH="/tmp/verifier/gems"   GEM_CACHE="/tmp/verifier/gems/cache"   /opt/chef/embedded/bin/gem install     busser-serverspec serverspec --no-rdoc --no-ri;   GEM_HOME="/tmp/verifier/gems"   GEM_PATH="/tmp/verifier/gems"   GEM_CACHE="/tmp/verifier/gems/cache"   /opt/chef/embedded/bin/gem install bundler --no-rdoc --no-ri;   GEM_HOME="/tmp/verifier/gems"   GEM_PATH="/tmp/verifier/gems"   GEM_CACHE="/tmp/verifier/gems/cache"   /opt/chef/embedded/bin/gem install     webmock --no-rdoc --no-ri;   localedef -v -c -i en_US -f UTF-8 en_US.UTF-8;   yum clean all && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
Commands.Name: run
